participant_1.background:
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.
I love to grow sunflowers.
I wear my boots as little as possible.
my favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror.
I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.

participant_2.background:
I had to put my dog down.
i aspire to be a millionaire.
i watch every football game at alabama.
i prefer the simpler times.
i like to go on long hikes.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am sorry to hear about your dog.
Thank you, I appreciate that. It was hard, but I know he is in a better place.
I am sure he is. What kind of dog was he?
He was a golden retriever named Buddy. He was the best dog anyone could ask for.
They are great dogs! I had to put my cat down last year.
I am so sorry to hear that. I know how hard it is to lose a pet.
Thanks, it was tough, but I know he is in a better place.
I agree. Do you have any other pets?
I have a fish and a couple of lizards.
Nice! I love lizards. I have a few snakes myself.
That's cool! Snakes are really cool.
Thanks! Have you ever been to any reptile shows?
No, I've never been to one. Have you?
Yeah, I've been to a few. They're really cool! There are so many different types of snakes and lizards to see.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check one out sometime.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
